findings.title: RRS - Redundant Require Statement
findings.description: Redundant require statement in the `add` function that can lead to extra gas costs and increased complexity.

findings.title: RSML - Redundant SafeMath Library
findings.description: Using SafeMath library which is redundant in Solidity versions greater than or equal to 0.8.0.

findings.title: MEM - Misleading Error Messages
findings.description: Misleading error messages that do not accurately reflect the problem, making it difficult to identify and fix the issue.

findings.title: IDI - Immutable Declaration Improvement
findings.description: State variables that are initialized once in the constructor and not modified afterwards can be declared as immutable.

findings.title: L02 - State Variables could be Declared Constant
findings.description: State variables can be declared as constant using the `constant` keyword, which can reduce gas consumption.

findings.title: L04 - Conformance to Solidity Naming Conventions
findings.description: Not following Solidity style guide naming conventions.

findings.title: L17 - Usage of Solidity Assembly
findings.description: Using assembly code which can be error-prone.
